strategy: Tyranid armies have a Strategy Rating of 1.
Initiative: The Nexus Brood, Coven Vanguard and Coven Ambush formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initative Rating of 2+.

sections.name: Cult Company Formations
sections.description: One Nexus Brood formation must be taken.

formations.name: 1 Nexus Brood
formations.units: One Genestealer Patriarch, three Genestealers, three Hybrid Acolytes
extraUnits: Add four Coven Limousines (75 points) or four Coven Goliaths (150 points)
Replace three Genestealers with three Hybrid Acolytes, or three Hybrid Acolytes with three Genestealers: Free

formations.name: Cult Company
formations.units: One Hybrid Primus, nine Cult Infantry
extraUnits: Add two Cult Fire Support: 50 points
Add three Cult Leman Russ or Cult Leman Russ Demolishers: 125 points

sections.name: Coven Vanguard Formations
sections.description: One Coven Vanguard formation may be taken for each Cult Company formation.

sections.name: Coven Ambush Formations
sections.description: One Coven Ambush formation may be taken for each Coven Vanguard formation.

sections.name: Cult Support Formations
sections.description: One Cult Support formation may be fielded per Cult Company formation.

formations.name: Cult Super Heavy Support
formations.units: One Coven Locus character, two Cult Baneblades
extraUnits: Replace up to two Cult Baneblades with Cult Shadowswords: 25 points each

formations.name: Cult Leman Russ Platoon
formations.units: One Coven Locus character, six Cult Leman Russ and/or Leman Russ Demolishers

formations.name: Cult Basilisk Battery
formations.units: One Coven Locus character, four Cult Basilisks

formations.name: Cult Mechanized Platoon
formations.units: One Coven Locus character, six Cult Infantry, three Cult Chimeras

sections.name: Cult Air Support
sections.description: Up to a fifth of the points available may be spent on these formations.

upgrades.title: Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation.

items.name: Coven Flak
items.description: Add up to two Coven Technicals

items.name: Cult Transport
items.description: Add enough transports to transport the entire formation with no space left over.
